headline: Valero’s Venezuelan Crude Deal Reshapes Feedstock Flexibility And Margins
summary: Valero Energy (NYSE:VLO) has secured imports of Venezuelan crude under a new U.S. approved export agreement. The arrangement gives Valero access to additional heavy crude supplies for its Gulf Coast refineries. This development affects how U.S. refiners source feedstock and could influence product output and fuel oil usage. Valero is one of the largest independent refiners in the U.S., with a heavy presence on the Gulf Coast and a focus on turning crude into gasoline, diesel, jet fuel, and...
